text: Hey Louie-- feel free to DM me the details (URL and portal ID) of your robots.txt page and I'm happy to take a look.

Additionally, are you encountering the 403 when you go directly to it, or are you using a third party tool that impersonates a search engine to crawl and test your robots.txt file? As a security measure, HubSpot-hosted content only allows search engine crawlers that come from that search engine's IPs, so if you're auditing the robots.txt file with a third-party tool that impersonates a search engine, we block it which is expected to return a 403 error
